```{r}
library(tiotemp)
library(AirSensor)

setArchiveBaseUrl("http://data.mazamascience.com/PurpleAir/v1") # SCAQMD sensors
```

```{r}
s <- sensor_load()
data <- s$data
meta <- s$meta
```

```{r, fig.height=14}
timeseriesBarChart(meta, data)
```

```{r}
timeseriesMap(data, meta)
```
